desc: The Remembrance Center & Gift Gallery is a specialty retail store specializing in gifts of condolence and keepsakes. Find funeral and cremation gifts to honor and celebrate life instead of sending flowers to the funeral home. Wedding, anniversary, baptism, grief, appreciation, unique and special occasions.

layout.text:
Lasting gifts for all gift-giving occasions.
Let us help you select the perfect way to honor a loved one who has passed away, celebrate an important life event, or show your appreciation to someone special.
